about_the_game:
With this Components DLC for Clip Maker you will get more then 4800 prefabs for creating your own special scenes and making excellent videos, films and clips.

Components DLC include the following prefabs:
324 Polygon City pack (constructor)
184 ArchVizPRO Interior 5 (constructor)
294 Cyber city (constructor)
35 Cyber city/Arcade machines (constructor)
141 Military pack 1 (constructor)
76 Modular Medieval Village (constructor)
254 Sci-fi Facility (constructor)
104 Winter environment (constructor)
85 Alien Fantasy Forest (constructor)
1 City block (NYC)
34 ancient props (constructor)
1631 houses props (constructor)
578 houses props (handle)
37 cyberpunk (constructor)
115 Asian props (constructor)
14 Asian props (handle)
13 Asian furniture (constructor)
31 vehicles (constructor)
114 military props (constructor)
102 military vehicles (constructor)
91 camping (constructor)
27 camping (handle)
71 school (constructor)
22 school (handle)
48 sport (constructor)
26 sport (handle)
38 winter props (constructor)
30 winter props (handle)
185 party fun hairs and accessories (handle)
12 blood spray VFX (Handle)
12 milk spray VFX (Handle)
55 Medieval Farm Tools (constructor)
32 Medieval Farm Tools (Handle)
Raft01 (Components/Props/Sport)
25 Hairs (Handle/Characters/Wear/headwear)
27 Christmas decorative props
Apple imac (constructor)
Apple keyboard (constructor)
Apple mouse (constructor)
Apple Pad (constructor)
25 Books (constructor)
8 Book sets (constructor)
Floor shelfl 01 (constructor)
Headphone 01 (constructor)
Macbook 01 (constructor)
Notebook stand (constructor)
4 Office bookcase (constructor)
9 Office chair (constructor)
12 Office set (constructor)
12 Office Table (constructor)
Phone on stand (constructor)
39 Sculpt (constructor)
8 Table lamps (constructor)
8 cars
7 Truck
6 Cyber cars (Vehicles/Future)
Cyber bike
82 High tech (Constructions)
192 Military outpost props
184 Labs props
127 Store props
209 Buildings (Constructions)
ACS 1 with shooting VFX (Vehicles/Future)
135 City street props
Dynamic clouds (VFX/Water)
50 Ships (Constructions)

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the menu where you are making settings of the timeline.

Guide: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2471526690

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

name: Components for Clip maker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 39 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Components for Clip Maker - have fun by creating your own 3D video stories, films, clips and videos. Specially created for amateurs and artists to bring your stories to life.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
